Ability.Name: Forewarn
Ability.Effect: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.

Ability.Name: Adaptability
Ability.Effect: Powers up moves of the same type.

Ability.Name: Aftermath
Ability.Effect: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.

Ability.Name: Air Lock
Ability.Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Ability.Name: Analytic
Ability.Effect: Strengthens moves when moving last.

Ability.Name: Anger Point
Ability.Effect: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.

Ability.Name: Anticipation
Ability.Effect: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.

Ability.Name: Arena Trap
Ability.Effect: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

Ability.Name: Aroma Veil
Ability.Effect: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Ability.Name: Aura Break
Ability.Effect: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed.

Ability.Name: Bad Dreams
Ability.Effect: Reduces a sleeping foe’s HP.

Ability.Name: Battle Armor
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Ability.Name: Big Pecks
Ability.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

Ability.Name: Blaze
Ability.Effect: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Bulletproof
Ability.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

Ability.Name: Cacophony
Ability.Effect: Avoids sound-based moves.

Ability.Name: Cheek Pouch
Ability.Effect: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

Ability.Name: Chlorophyll
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in sunshine.

Ability.Name: Clear Body
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon’s stats from being lowered.

Ability.Name: Cloud Nine
Ability.Effect: Eliminates the effects of weather.

Ability.Name: Color Change
Ability.Effect: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the foe’s move.

Ability.Name: Competitive
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Sp.Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

Ability.Name: Compound Eyes
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon’s accuracy is boosted.

Ability.Name: Contrary
Ability.Effect: Inverts stat modifiers.

Ability.Name: Cursed Body
Ability.Effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Cute Charm
Ability.Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

Ability.Name: Damp
Ability.Effect: Prevents combatants from self destructing.

Ability.Name: Dark Aura
Ability.Effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

Ability.Name: Defeatist
Ability.Effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack below 50% HP.

Ability.Name: Defiant
Ability.Effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

Ability.Name: Download
Ability.Effect: Adjusts power according to the foe’s lowest defensive stat.

Ability.Name: Drizzle
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

Ability.Name: Drought
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon makes it sunny if it is in battle.

Ability.Name: Dry Skin
Ability.Effect: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

Ability.Name: Early Bird
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Ability.Name: Effect Spore
Ability.Effect: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.

Ability.Name: Fairy Aura
Ability.Effect: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

Ability.Name: Filter
Ability.Effect: Powers down super-effective moves.

Ability.Name: Flame Body
Ability.Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe.

Ability.Name: Flare Boost
Ability.Effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.

Ability.Name: Flash Fire
Ability.Effect: Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move.

Ability.Name: Flower Gift
Ability.Effect: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

Ability.Name: Flower Veil
Ability.Effect: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

Ability.Name: Forecast
Ability.Effect: Transforms with the weather.

Ability.Name: Forewarn
Ability.Effect: Determines what moves the foe has.

Ability.Name: Friend Guard
Ability.Effect: Decreases damage inflicted against ally Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Frisk
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

Ability.Name: Fur Coat
Ability.Effect: Halves damage from physical moves.

Ability.Name: Gale Wings
Ability.Effect: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

Ability.Name: Gluttony
Ability.Effect: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

Ability.Name: Gooey
Ability.Effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Ability.Name: Grass Pelt
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Ability.Name: Guts
Ability.Effect: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Harvest
Ability.Effect: Restores any held Berry after the turn on which it is used.

Ability.Name: Healer
Ability.Effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

Ability.Name: Heatproof
Ability.Effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Ability.Name: Heavy Metal
Ability.Effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Ability.Name: Honey Gather
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

Ability.Name: Huge Power
Ability.Effect: Raises the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Hustle
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

Ability.Name: Hydration
Ability.Effect: Heals status problems if it is raining.

Ability.Name: Hyper Cutter
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.

Ability.Name: Ice Body
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

Ability.Name: Illuminate
Ability.Effect: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Illusion
Ability.Effect: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

Ability.Name: Immunity
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Ability.Name: Imposter
Ability.Effect: Transforms upon entering battle.

Ability.Name: Infiltrator
Ability.Effect: Ignores Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard.

Ability.Name: Inner Focus
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

Ability.Name: Insomnia
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Ability.Name: Intimidate
Ability.Effect: Lowers the foe’s Attack stat.

Ability.Name: Iron Barbs
Ability.Effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

Ability.Name: Iron Fist
Ability.Effect: Boosts the power of punching moves.

Ability.Name: Justified
Ability.Effect: Raises Attack when hit by dark-type moves.

Ability.Name: Keen Eye
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

Ability.Name: Klutz
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

Ability.Name: Leaf Guard
Ability.Effect: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.

Ability.Name: Levitate
Ability.Effect: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Ability.Name: Light Metal
Ability.Effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

Ability.Name: Lightning Rod
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves.

Ability.Name: Limber
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Ability.Name: Liquid Ooze
Ability.Effect: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.

Ability.Name: Magic Bounce
Ability.Effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

Ability.Name: Magic Guard
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Ability.Name: Magician
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Ability.Name: Magma Armor
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

Ability.Name: Magnet Pull
Ability.Effect: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.

Ability.Name: Marvel Scale
Ability.Effect: Boosts Defense if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Mega Launcher
Ability.Effect: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

Ability.Name: Minus
Ability.Effect: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus.

Ability.Name: Mold Breaker
Ability.Effect: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Ability.Name: Moody
Ability.Effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

Ability.Name: Motor Drive
Ability.Effect: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Ability.Name: Moxie
Ability.Effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Multiscale
Ability.Effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

Ability.Name: Multitype
Ability.Effect: Changes type to match the held Plate.

Ability.Name: Mummy
Ability.Effect: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

Ability.Name: Natural Cure
Ability.Effect: All status problems are healed upon switching out.

Ability.Name: No Guard
Ability.Effect: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.

Ability.Name: Normalize
Ability.Effect: All the Pokémon’s moves become the Normal type.

Ability.Name: Oblivious
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.

Ability.Name: Overcoat
Ability.Effect: Protects against damage from weather.

Ability.Name: Overgrow
Ability.Effect: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Own Tempo
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Ability.Name: Parental Bond
Ability.Effect: Parent and child attack together.

Ability.Name: Pickpocket
Ability.Effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held item on contact.

Ability.Name: Pickup
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon may pick up items.

Ability.Name: Pixilate
Ability.Effect: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.

Ability.Name: Plus
Ability.Effect: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.

Ability.Name: Poison Heal
Ability.Effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

Ability.Name: Poison Point
Ability.Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.

Ability.Name: Poison Touch
Ability.Effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning Pokémon upon contact when attacking.

Ability.Name: Prankster
Ability.Effect: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

Ability.Name: Pressure
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.

Ability.Name: Protean
Ability.Effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the same type of the move it is using.

Ability.Name: Pure Power
Ability.Effect: Boosts the power of physical attacks.

Ability.Name: Quick Feet
Ability.Effect: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

Ability.Name: Rain Dish
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

Ability.Name: Rattled
Ability.Effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a Dark, Ghost, or Bug move.

Ability.Name: Reckless
Ability.Effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

Ability.Name: Refrigerate
Ability.Effect: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.

Ability.Name: Regenerator
Ability.Effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon leaving battle.

Ability.Name: Rivalry
Ability.Effect: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

Ability.Name: Rock Head
Ability.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Ability.Name: Rough Skin
Ability.Effect: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.

Ability.Name: Run Away
Ability.Effect: Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Sand Force
Ability.Effect: Strengthens Rock, Ground, and Steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Sand Rush
Ability.Effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Sand Stream
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

Ability.Name: Sand Veil
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Sap Sipper
Ability.Effect: Absorbs Grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

Ability.Name: Scrappy
Ability.Effect: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

Ability.Name: Serene Grace
Ability.Effect: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

Ability.Name: Shadow Tag
Ability.Effect: Prevents the foe from escaping.

Ability.Name: Shed Skin
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Ability.Name: Sheer Force
Ability.Effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

Ability.Name: Shell Armor
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Ability.Name: Shield Dust
Ability.Effect: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Ability.Name: Simple
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

Ability.Name: Skill Link
Ability.Effect: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Ability.Name: Slow Start
Ability.Effect: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

Ability.Name: Sniper
Ability.Effect: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

Ability.Name: Snow Cloak
Ability.Effect: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

Ability.Name: Snow Warning
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

Ability.Name: Solar Power
Ability.Effect: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

Ability.Name: Solid Rock
Ability.Effect: Powers down super-effective moves.

Ability.Name: Soundproof
Ability.Effect: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

Ability.Name: Speed Boost
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon’s Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Ability.Name: Stall
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.

Ability.Name: Stance Change
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

Ability.Name: Static
Ability.Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

Ability.Name: Steadfast
Ability.Effect: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Ability.Name: Stench
Ability.Effect: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Ability.Name: Sticky Hold
Ability.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

Ability.Name: Storm Drain
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.

Ability.Name: Strong Jaw
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

Ability.Name: Sturdy
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.

Ability.Name: Suction Cups
Ability.Effect: Negates moves that force switching out.

Ability.Name: Super Luck
Ability.Effect: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

Ability.Name: Swarm
Ability.Effect: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Sweet Veil
Ability.Effect: Prevents itself and its allies from falling asleep.

Ability.Name: Swift Swim
Ability.Effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

Ability.Name: Symbiosis
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

Ability.Name: Synchronize
Ability.Effect: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

Ability.Name: Tangled Feet
Ability.Effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Ability.Name: Technician
Ability.Effect: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

Ability.Name: Telepathy
Ability.Effect: Protects against damaging moves from friendly Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Teravolt
Ability.Effect: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Ability.Name: Thick Fat
Ability.Effect: Raises resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Ability.Name: Tinted Lens
Ability.Effect: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

Ability.Name: Torrent
Ability.Effect: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

Ability.Name: Tough Claws
Ability.Effect: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

Ability.Name: Toxic Boost
Ability.Effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× when poisoned.

Ability.Name: Trace
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

Ability.Name: Truant
Ability.Effect: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

Ability.Name: Turboblaze
Ability.Effect: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

Ability.Name: Unaware
Ability.Effect: Ignores any change in stats by the foe.

Ability.Name: Unburden
Ability.Effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Ability.Name: Unnerve
Ability.Effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

Ability.Name: Victory Star
Ability.Effect: Raises moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

Ability.Name: Vital Spirit
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

Ability.Name: Volt Absorb
Ability.Effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Ability.Name: Water Absorb
Ability.Effect: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

Ability.Name: Water Veil
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Ability.Name: Weak Armor
Ability.Effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by any move.

Ability.Name: White Smoke
Ability.Effect: Prevents the Pokémon’s stats from being lowered.

Ability.Name: Wonder Guard
Ability.Effect: Only super effective moves will hit.

Ability.Name: Wonder Skin
Ability.Effect: Has a 50% chance of protecting against non-damaging moves that inflict major status ailments.

Ability.Name: Zen Mode
Ability.Effect: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is halved.
